text: Kulla Chapel () is a chapel in Eksjö Municipality in Sweden. It is located down country road 28 Eksjö and Nässjö. It belongs to the Höreda Parish of the Church of Sweden. The chapel was opened in 1927. The chapel was destroyed in a fire on 27 May 2000. The fire was connected to Satanism However the chapel was rebuilt and reopened on 13 May 2001. ==References== ==Related pages== *Bäckaby Old Church ==Other websites== Category:Church of Sweden churches Category:2000s fires Category:1927 establishments in Sweden Category:2000 disestablishments in Europe Category:2000s disestablishments in Sweden
title: Kulla Chapel
